pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Projections // Extract useful time components of a date object, such as day of week, weekend, holiday, day of month, etc, and put it in a data frame. This can be used to create many predictor variables out of a single time variable, which can then be used in a regression or decision tree. Also includes function plotCalendarHeatmap which draws a calendar and overlays a heatmap based on values.
